item.title: Improving Pull Request flow with PR templates and PR Completion Stats in Azure DevOps
item.description: PR templates PR Completion Stats extension Code reviews and pull requests are a totally normal practice these days if you're working together with other developers. Even if you're working solo you probably don't want to commit to main branch directly if you have CI/CD in place. That's when adding changes through pull requests and code reviews come into picture.
